text: Georges Wolinski (28 June 1934 - 7 January 2015) was a French cartoonist, journalist and comic book writer. He is best known for his work on the satirical newspaper Charlie Hebdo and the daily newspaper Lib√©ration. In 2005, he was awarded the Legion of Honour. Wolinski was born in Tunis, Tunisia. His father was Polish and his mother was a Tunisian of Italian Jewish ancestry. Wolinski was among the victims who were killed in a shooting at Charlie Hebdo's Paris headquarters on 7 January 2015. He was 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2015 deaths Category:French cartoonists Category:French journalists Category:Victims of the Charlie Hebdo shooting Category:Jewish French writers Category:Recipients of the Order of the Legion of Honour Category:Writers from Tunis Category:Writers from Paris
title: Georges Wolinski
